title: Sketchbook Folio, "Quick Study of Light and Rain over Ocean", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Cursory drawing of water in foreground. Sky is full of detailed clouds, with rain falling at left in distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Quick Study of Light and Rain over Ocean", 1870–85.
1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-49.
